item.title: Python tips and tricks
item.description: Getting started This post will contain many interesting tips and tricks that I have learned these last months and I use constantly. So let’s get started ðŸ˜„. One-Liners If you are familiar with python, you will know that the language has many powerful One-Liners expressions. For that reason, I will show you some of them. List Comprehensions The first one is probably my favorite, because it allows you to manipulate lists in a really cool way.
